response.answer_text: VLSI is the process that involves the creating of Integrated Circuits. There are several steps involved in this making, IC design and verification, Prototyping, SoC Verification, and the Backend design. Then it is ready to proceed further for the fabrication and testing. Some of the other topics to cover under VLSI are as follows: Digital background Semiconductor background CMOS Processing VLSI terminologies VLSI Design Flow Digital Design SoC design
